dfts<-covid_ts%>% # Human Development Index (HDI)
  group_by(location)%>%
  summarise(HDI=tail(human_development_index,1),New_cases=tail(new_cases,1),
            New_deaths=tail(New_deaths,1))%>%
  rename("Country Name"="location")
